name: Hot Air Pet Delivery 2.0
description:
Hot Air Pet Delivery is a balancing side-scroller, where you are the operator of a hot air balloon whose job is to deliver pets.  You will have to use the cannon on your balloon get these animals to the many houses in this small town.  Try to land a cat or dog at every home so that these townsfolk can have a new loving furry friend!

Space Bar : fires cannon, but you lose weight

E : Release hot air, caution you could hit the ground, get stuck and lose

Make seven out of ten (7/10) deliveries and you win.

Enjoy the ride and your job!
